SELECT v.*,i.id iid,i.type,i.sort,(CASE WHEN (v.role_type='USER' OR v.role_type='PLAYER' OR v.role_type='BABY') THEN u.usernick ELSE (CASE WHEN v.role_type='TEAM' THEN t.`name` ELSE l.`name` END) END) ivname
,ip.praise,ip.unpraise
,0 praise,0 unpraise
FROM m_index i
LEFT JOIN m_images v ON v.id=i.oth_id
LEFT JOIN m_videos v ON v.id=i.oth_id
LEFT JOIN m_user u ON u.id=v.user_id AND (v.role_type='USER' OR v.role_type='PLAYER' OR v.role_type='BABY') LEFT JOIN t_team_info t ON t.id=v.user_id AND v.role_type='TEAM' LEFT JOIN a_league l ON l.id=v.user_id AND v.role_type='LEAGUE'
LEFT JOIN (SELECT iv_id,user_id,(CASE WHEN MAX(p_state)=2 THEN 2 ELSE 0 END) unpraise,MIN(p_state) praise,p_type FROM m_iv_praise GROUP BY iv_id,user_id) ip ON ip.iv_id=v.id AND ip.p_type=v.role_type AND ip.user_id=#{maps.userId}
WHERE i.type=#{maps.type}
AND v.title LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{maps.title}),'%')
ORDER BY i.sort
LIMIT #{maps.start},#{maps.rows}

LEFT JOIN m_videos v ON v.id=i.oth_id

LEFT JOIN (SELECT iv_id,user_id,(CASE WHEN MAX(p_state)=2 THEN 2 ELSE 0 END) unpraise,MIN(p_state) praise,p_type FROM m_iv_praise GROUP BY iv_id,user_id) ip ON ip.iv_id=v.id AND ip.p_type=v.role_type AND ip.user_id=#{maps.userId}
WHERE i.type=#{maps.type}
AND v.title LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{maps.title}),'%')

SELECT i.id iid,i.sort,i.type,b.*,u.usernick,u.phone,DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(TO_DAYS(NOW())-TO_DAYS(u.borndate)), '%Y')+0 AS age,img.f_src FROM m_index i LEFT JOIN f_baby_info b ON b.id=i.oth_id LEFT JOIN m_user u ON u.id=b.user_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM m_images WHERE f_status=1 AND role_type='BABY' ORDER BY create_time ASC ) img ON img.user_id=b.user_id WHERE i.type='baby' AND b.if_del = 0 GROUP BY i.id ORDER BY i.sort

SELECT tp.teaminfo_id,t.`name`,tp.player_num,tp.position tposition,p.*,u.usernick,u.username,u.phone,u.borndate,DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(TO_DAYS(NOW())-TO_DAYS(u.borndate)), '%Y')+0 AS age
,q_player_list.jinqiu_num
FROM t_team_player tp LEFT JOIN t_team_info t ON t.id=tp.teaminfo_id LEFT JOIN p_player_info p ON p.user_id=tp.user_id LEFT JOIN m_user u ON u.id=tp.user_id
LEFT JOIN (SELECT m.league_id,q.teaminfo_id,q.rel_palyer_id,q.name,SUM(q.jinqiu_num) jinqiu_num,count(1) FROM q_user_data q LEFT JOIN q_match_info m ON m.id=q.q_match_id GROUP BY m.league_id,q.teaminfo_id,q.rel_palyer_id,q.name) q_player_list ON q_player_list.rel_palyer_id=u.id
WHERE 1=1 AND t.is_exist=1
AND u.username LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{maps.username}),'%')
AND u.usernick LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{maps.usernick}),'%')
AND u.phone LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{maps.phone}),'%')
AND t.`name` LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{maps.tname}),'%')
AND t.`name` LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{maps.tname}),'%')
AND tp.teaminfo_id=#{maps.tid}
AND EXISTS(SELECT g.* FROM a_group_event g WHERE g.teaminfo_id=t.id AND g.group_id=#{maps.gid})
ORDER BY q_player_list.jinqiu_num DESC
LIMIT #{maps.start},#{maps.rows}

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM( ( SELECT tp.teaminfo_id,t.`name`,tp.player_num,tp.position tposition,p.*,u.usernick,u.username,u.phone,u.borndate,DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(TO_DAYS(NOW())-TO_DAYS(u.borndate)), '%Y')+0 AS age
,q_player_list.jinqiu_num
FROM t_team_player tp LEFT JOIN t_team_info t ON t.id=tp.teaminfo_id LEFT JOIN p_player_info p ON p.user_id=tp.user_id LEFT JOIN m_user u ON u.id=tp.user_id
LEFT JOIN (SELECT m.league_id,q.teaminfo_id,q.rel_palyer_id,q.name,SUM(q.jinqiu_num) jinqiu_num,count(1) FROM q_user_data q LEFT JOIN q_match_info m ON m.id=q.q_match_id GROUP BY m.league_id,q.teaminfo_id,q.rel_palyer_id,q.name) q_player_list ON q_player_list.rel_palyer_id=u.id
WHERE 1=1 AND t.is_exist=1
AND u.username LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{maps.username}),'%')
AND u.usernick LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{maps.usernick}),'%')
AND u.phone LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{maps.phone}),'%')
AND t.`name` LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{maps.tname}),'%')
AND t.`name` LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{maps.tname}),'%')
AND tp.teaminfo_id=#{maps.tid}
AND EXISTS(SELECT g.* FROM a_group_event g WHERE g.teaminfo_id=t.id AND g.group_id=#{maps.gid})
) cot_t)
